did.unittitle: Crank letters to Mayor Samuel Ashbridge
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: This collection represents two years of letters sent to Mayor Samuel Ashbridge, while in office. It appears that most of these letters request the Mayor's assistance in a variety of issues, from the quality of city water to personal debts. Quite a few of the letters appear to have been written by patients in mental institutions and incarcerated people with unusual and bizarre comments and requests.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
